Our Services

From new installations to emergency repairs, we offer comprehensive roofing services to keep your home protected and beautiful.

Residential Standard and Standing Seam Metal Roof Replacements

We replace all types of sloped roof systems, with standard shingles or metal roof systems.

Residential Leak Repairs and Maintenance

Fast, reliable leak detection and roof repairs that keep your home watertight and worry-free.

Flat Roofing Commercial and Residential Replacements

Expert flat roof replacements to ensure lasting waterproof protection.

Flat Roofing Leak Repairs and Maintenance

Fast and reliable roof repairs for leaks, storm damage, and wear. Emergency services available 24/7 for urgent situations.

Insulation Top Ups

Boost your home’s comfort and cut energy bills with an insulation top-up.

Special Projects

Our special projects division focuses on unique roofing challenges that require advanced materials and techniques.

About Us

At Picturesque Exteriors, we've been protecting homes and families since 2012. Our commitment to excellence, attention to detail, and customer satisfaction has made us the most trusted name in roofing.

We believe that every home deserves a roof that not only protects but enhances its beauty. That's why we use only the finest materials and employ the most skilled craftsmen in the industry.

  • Over 12 years of roofing experience
  • Red Seal Licensed
  • Premium quality materials only
  • Lifetime workmanship warranty
  • A+ BBB rating
  • Locally owned and operated
